title: US opens door for crypto ETFs, trusts to earn staking rewards
summary: Guidance from the Internal Revenue Service appeared to offer additional regulatory clarity for crypto staking through exchange-traded products.

title: EToro stock jumps on Q3 results, $150M buyback plan
summary: The company posted $20.8 billion in client assets, a 48% increase in profit, and plans for a $150 million share buyback program.

title: Rumble to buy crypto miner Northern Data after Tether investment
summary: Reports said that the AI infrastructure purchase would be valued at about $767 million as part of a stock deal, about three months after a planned acquisition with Tether.

title: Bitcoin ‘double bottom’ eyes $110K, but CME gap may postpone rally
summary: A bullish breakout lifts Bitcoin toward $110,000, but a stablecoin build-up and looming CME gaps signal caution.

title: Bitcoin’s next move could shock traders if BTC price breaks above $112K
summary: A Bitcoin rally through $112,000 could be brewing. Cointelegraph explains why the pending release of US economic data and the end of the government shutdown are good for BTC.

title: Coinbase debuts token sale platform with Monad launch
summary: Coinbase’s regulated platform reopens access to token offerings for retail investors after a hiatus of years since the peak of the ICO market.

title: VC Roundup: Selective capital, shrinking rounds highlight crypto’s cautious reset
summary: Funding now targets infrastructure, stablecoins and payments as big bets fade and Bitcoin projects bootstrap.

title: Bitcoin, ETH ETFs see $1.7B outflow but whale buying softens the price impact
summary: Despite $1.7 billion in spot Bitcoin and Ether ETF outflows, whale accumulation and altcoin inflows continue to stabilize sentiment across the broader crypto market.

title: Strategy adds $50M in Bitcoin holdings to crypto stockpile
summary: Michael Saylor’s company increased its acquisition of BTC over the previous week by purchasing another 487 coins as part of its $67 billion treasury.

title: Why Tether is acting more like a central bank than a stablecoin
summary: Once a simple stablecoin issuer, Tether now mirrors central bank mechanics with reserves, profits and policy-like decisions.
